CPL: Commercial Pilot License. A license that permits the holder to act as a pilot in command of an aircraft for compensation or hire.
DGCA: Directorate General of Civil Aviation. The Indian governmental regulatory body for civil aviation.
VFR: Visual Flight Rules. Rules governing the procedures for conducting flight under visual conditions.
IFR: Instrument Flight Rules. Rules governing the procedures for conducting instrument flight.
ATPL: Airline Transport Pilot License. The highest level of aircraft pilot certificate.
CAR: Civil Aviation Requirements. Rules and regulations issued by the DGCA.
METAR: Meteorological Aerodrome Report. A format for reporting weather information.
TAF: Terminal Aerodrome Forecast. A format for reporting forecast weather conditions.
